summary: The Mental Health Improvement Act (H.R. 3260) seeks to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize mental and behavioral health education and training grants. Specifically, it updates Section 756(f) of the Act, extending the grant period from fiscal years 2026 through 2030, effectively replacing the previously specified period of 2023 through 2027. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on May 7, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
